Topic.Title: ESPER: The Secret Of Drom Bennacht

Posts.EditableText: I've recently been playing [b:kivpafgy]ESPER[/b:kivpafgy] and seem to have reached a dead end. Has anyone figured out how to get the wardrobe open or what to do in the room below the record player?
